en: The task that lies ahead -- to put Rapid City and the area back together -- will not be done for years .
baseline: 接下来的任务 — — 把快速城和地区重新统一起来 — — 将不会在几年内完成。

en: SBA loans are presently available to businessmen and homeowners affected by the flood .
baseline: SBA贷款现已向受洪灾影响的商人和房主提供。
他们按5/8 % 的利息支付。

en: But I would rate the chances of passing my 90 % forgiveness bill as poor .
baseline: 但是,我将把通过我的90%的宽恕法案的几率评为很差。
zh: 但是,我将把通过我90%的宽恕法案的几率评为低.
但是,我将把通过我90%的宽恕法案的几率评为低.
但是,我将把通过我百分之九十的赦免法案的机会评为很差.
但是,我将把通过我90%的宽恕法案的几率评为低.

en: Many of you have already written describing problems you are having with Federal agencies as a result of the flood .
baseline: 你们中的许多人已经写了文章,描述了由于洪水而与联邦机构发生的问题。

en: You can reach me at : 508 Cannon Office Building , Washington , D.C. 20515 .
baseline: 你可以致电我: 508 Cannon Office Building, Washington, D.C. 20515 。

你可以到:508华盛顿特区炮兵办公室大厦20515.

en: First , it guarantees that no one dispossesses fellow citizens by obtaining a disproportionate share of what nature provides for humanity .
baseline: 首先,它保证没有人通过获得自然为人类提供的不相称的份额来剥夺同胞。

en: Some economists might be tempted to suggest that the rent can be collected publicly simply by selling land outright at auction .
baseline: 一些经济学家可能被诱惑说,租税可以通过直接在拍卖中出售土地来公开征集。

en: Collecting rent annually provides access to land for persons with limited access to credit .
baseline: 每年征收租金,让有限制信贷的人士获得土地。
